EmailTemplate.name: Marathon Letterhead
EmailTemplate.subject: Credit Line Increase Financials Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Kristie,
Per your request.
Would you please provide me with 2 years of audited financials. This way I can provide them to WEX Bank for a credit line increase.
Jason Duke Regional Sales Manager WEX Inc. 2066 Cornell Rd Middleburg, FL 32068 o 904-203-7322 | c 904-315-3176 | f 207-253-1490
Jason.Dukes@wexinc.com
